reviews.review_msg: This prof is easy as hell as long as you write what she wants to hear.  Follow her notes verbatim and its an easy B+ or higher...if not you fail. Marking is erratic  with no explaination and her accent is VERY difficult to comprehend... gets off track and has an annoying attitude.  Definately look for other profs if you want to learn

This teacher has no clue how to effectively teach a class.  While it is clear that she is passionate and knowledgeable about the material, she is boring, unclear, and didn't seem to realize that this was a first year course/not the only course people are taking.  I would never take a class with her again.

Would be a great high school teacher - a bit unserious, disorganized, likes to play tricks with students ("oh I'm gonna give you a quiz"), but otherwise she is friendly, generous marker, encourages class participation. It is very hard to do poorly in her class. She's perhaps too harsh for allowing no breaks & forcing you to do ALL the readings!
